text: Simon Mbugua (born 8 June 1991) is a Kenyan international footballer who plays for Posta Rangers, as a right back. ==Career== Mbugua has played club football for Thika United and Posta Rangers. He made his international debut for Kenya in 2016. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Kenyan footballers Category:Kenya international footballers Category:Thika United F.C. players Category:Posta Rangers F.C. players Category:Kenyan Premier League players Category:Association football fullbacks
title: Simon Mbugua
